item.description:
"Inglorious Bastards" - In Quentin Tarantino's movie "Inglorious Bastards," during World War II a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as "The Basterds" are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by scalping and brutally killing Nazis. The Basterds soon cross paths with a Jewish teenage girl (whose family was exterminated by the Nazis) who works at a movie theater in Paris - owned by a kindly old lady who has taken her in - which is targeted by the soldiers. The girl finds herself in a unique situation when an infatuated German war hero persuades his superiors to screen their latest propaganda film at her theatre. Will she seek revenge?
